1.0.name: wordpress/google-blog-search-preview
1.0.description: Google Blog Search Preview is a simple plugin for Wordpress which displays incoming links from Google Blog Search. This is similar to Technorati incoming links and hence is displayed on the Activity tab of WordPress Dashboard.

1.1.name: wordpress/google-blog-search-preview
